metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1766 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Due to improper handling of uploaded images it is possible in very unlikely and rare conditions to force the agents browser to execute malicious javascript from a special crafted SVG file rendered as inline jpg file. This issue affects: ((OTRS)) Community Edition 5.0.x version 5.0.39 and prior versions; 6.0.x version 6.0.24 and prior versions. OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.13 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
